dlt_views.sql_condition: select customer_id, company_id, seg_team_cge, seg_team_cge_transformed, sub_segment from live.fs_customer_segment_source

select regexp_extract(header__betline, '^\w+\s\w+\s(\w+)', 1) as meeting_location, to_timestamp(regexp_extract(header__betline, '\w+\s\w+\s\w+\s(\d{2}/\d{2}/\d{4}+)', 1), 'dd/MM/yyyy') as meeting_date, seg.seg_team_cge_transformed as sub_segment, case when left(fo.header__processingLocation__cbLocation__centreNo,1) in (3,6,9) then 'RC ESC/EWallet' when left(fo.header__processingLocation__cbLocation__centreNo,1) in (1,2,4,5,7,8) then 'OCB ESC/Ewallet' when header__sourceType=17 then 'TBAS' when header__sourceType=1 then 'TB Voice' when header__processingLocation__directInputLocation__citType in (20,23) then 'Classic 3-in-1' when fo.header__processingLocation__directInputLocation__citType in (17) then 'eWin' when fo.header__processingLocation__directInputLocation__citType in (11) then 'eWin(New)' when fo.header__processingLocation__directInputLocation__citType in (26,28) then 'Racing Touch' when fo.header__processingLocation__directInputLocation__citType in (30,31) then 'GoalX' else 'NA' end as channel, regexp_extract(header__betline, '^\w+\s(\w+)', 1) as bet_type,'null' as race_no, 'null' as first_race_no, 'null' as last_race_no, true as fo_flag, fo.header__accountNo as account_no, ac.customer_id, cast((cast(fo.header__sellRequest__betVar__totalAmount as decimal(22,2))/100.00) as decimal(22,2)) as ttl_cost, false as cancelled, 0.00 as cancelled_amount, fo.ticket__ticketId as ticketid, fo.header__systemId as systemcode, fo.ticket__sellingDateTime as sell_time from live.ab_sb_bet_fo_vw fo left join live.v_wagering_dim_account_vw ac on fo.header__accountNo = ac.account_no left join edap.uc_csii_dna_rt_racing_dashboard.mv_customer_segment_snapshot_dlt_meta seg on ac.customer_id = seg.customer_id UNION ALL select 'null' as meeting_location, cast(null as timestamp) as meeting_date, 'null' as sub_segment, 'null' as channel, 'null' as bet_type, 'null' as race_no, 'null' as first_race_no, 'null' as last_race_no, true as fo_flag, 'null' as account_no, 9999999 as customer_id, 999999.99 as ttl_cost, true as cancelled, cast(cast(cfo.ticket__betVar__totalRefund as decimal(22,2))/100.0 as decimal(22,2)) as cancelled_amount, cfo.ticket__ticketId as ticketid, cfo.header__systemId as systemcode, cfo.ticket__sellingDateTime as sell_time from live.ab_sb_cancel_fo_vw cfo

select meeting_date, case when meeting_loc = 1 then 'ST' when meeting_loc = 2 then 'HV' when meeting_loc = 3 then 'X1' when meeting_loc = 4 then 'X2' when meeting_loc = 5 then 'S1' when meeting_loc = 6 then 'S2' when meeting_loc = 7 then 'S3' when meeting_loc = 8 then 'S4' when meeting_loc = 9 then 'S5' when meeting_loc = 10 then 'CH' end as meeting_location, 'null' as sub_segment, case when left(case when SOURCE_TYPE = 4 OR SOURCE_TYPE = 19 OR CIT_TYPE = 'IBT' then nvl(CBBT_CENTRE_NO, OLD_CB_CENTRE_NO) else CBBT_CENTRE_NO end, 1) in (3, 6, 9) then 'RC ESC/EWallet' when left(case when SOURCE_TYPE = 4 OR SOURCE_TYPE = 19 OR CIT_TYPE = 'IBT' then nvl(CBBT_CENTRE_NO, OLD_CB_CENTRE_NO) else CBBT_CENTRE_NO end, 1) in (1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8) then 'OCB ESC/Ewallet' when SUBSTRing(V_TERM_NO, 1, 4) = 'TBAS' or SOURCE_TYPE = 17 then 'TBAS' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('IOSBS', 'AOSBS') then 'Classic 3-in-1' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('JCBWEKBA') then 'eWin' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('JCBW') then 'eWin(New)' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('IBUT', 'IBUA') then 'Racing Touch' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and CIT_TYPE in ('MASBAI', 'MASBAA') then 'GoalX' when SOURCE_TYPE <> 17 and nvl(CIT_TYPE, '') not in ('AMBS', 'CIT-3', 'CIT3', 'CIT-3A', 'CIT3A', 'CIT-5', 'CIT5', 'CIT6', 'CIT-8', 'CIT8', 'CIT-PDA', 'CITPDA', 'PDA', 'EWIN', 'E-WIN', 'JCBW', 'MANGO', 'JCBWEKBA', 'MANGOCOMBO', 'MANGODELUXE', 'MPB', 'TWM', 'WLPDA', 'ITV', 'ITVBS', 'IP-PHONE', 'IPPHONE', 'IPPBS', 'APINOW', 'IOSBS', 'JCMOW', 'AOSBS', 'APISMC', 'APITD', 'IBUT', 'APIWC', 'IBUA', 'WOSBS', 'MASBAI', 'MASBAA') then 'TB Voice' else 'NA' end as channel, pmu.bet_type, pmu.race_no, case when bet_type <> 'ALUP' then null when bet_type = 'ALUP' then pmu.allup_race_no1 end as first_race_no, case when allup_event_no = 2 then allup_race_no2 when allup_event_no = 3 then allup_race_no3 when allup_event_no = 4 then allup_race_no4 when allup_event_no = 5 then allup_race_no5 when allup_event_no = 6 then allup_race_no6 else 'null' end as last_race_no, false as fo_flag, pmu.acct_no as account_no, ac.customer_id, cast(cast(pmu.ttl_cost as decimal(22,2))/100 as decimal(22,2)) as ttl_cost, false as cancelled, 0 as cancelled_amount, cast((DATEDIFF(day, cast('1900-01-01' as date), cast(pmu.selling_date as date)) * 1000000000000 + cast(case pmu.oltp_id when 'ACP01' then 20 when 'ACP02' then 21 when 'AGP01' then 17 when 'AGP02' then 18 when 'AGP03' then 19 when 'AGP04' then 1 end as long) * 1000000000 + cast(pmu.headerActivityID as long)) as long) as ticketid, pmu.selling_date, pmu.ac_tran_no, pmu.time_stamp from live.ab_race_pmu_vw pmu left join live.v_wagering_dim_account_vw ac on pmu.acct_no = ac.account_no UNION ALL select cast(null as timestamp) as meeting_date, 'null' as meeting_location, 'null' as sub_segment, 'null' as channel, 'null' as bet_type, 'null' as race_no, 'null' as first_race_no, 'null' as last_race_no, cast(null as boolean) as fo_flag, cpmu.acct_no as account_no, 9999999 as customer_id, cast(null as decimal(22,2)) as ttl_cost, true as cancelled, cast(cast(cpmu.meet_ttl_cost as decimal(22,2))/100.0 as decimal(22,2)) as cancelled_amount, 9999999 as ticketid, cpmu.selling_date, cpmu.ac_tran_no, cpmu.time_stamp from live.ab_cancel_pmu_vw cpmu
